thought: To craft a red_nether_bricks, I first need to craft a nether_brick. A nether_brick requires 1 netherrack, which I have in slot 30. Therefore I will smelt the netherrack in slot 30 into slot 12.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 30 to slot 12 with quantity 1
